original_title: Sing Along With Tobee 1 - Super Simple
overview: Tobee is an adorable little puppet with a curious mind and an infectious laugh. He loves to learn new songs from his friend Caitie. They dance a lot. They laugh a lot. And they learn a lot. Follow along as Catie teaches Tobee and the audience at home the words and gestures to classic nursery rhymes and original kids' songs from Super Simple Songs.
title: Sing Along With Tobee 1 - Super Simple
